title: Orianna or Nami?

replies.body: My vote is for nami, support is a lot more fun (for me) than mana mages mid right now.

Do you agree with the sentiment that mana mages have basically been crapped by on the balance team? Playing as Lux or Syndra mid (or many other mana mages) has become obnoxious when you can't be aggressive with spells without mana-burning (unlike the manaless Champions).

Orianna got hit really hard by mana nerfs 
Nami is still at her ~normal~ state, like she's a lane bully right now with heals and stuns and auto-attack buffs, and Rito hasn't touch her as a champion yet.

I'd go for Nami, mainly because she's a lane bully, good peels, and easier to play than Orianna. Oh and also I main Nami, so NAMI~
Hmm Nami might be more fun right now, plus dat laugh tho "hahaha yeaah"

I don't play Nami so I can't really comment on her

Orianna has a bit of a rough time vs manaless champions atm, but I still really like playing her; once you dig a bit deeper into the strategy of playing Orianna, it's cool how you can start to control a game.

In general pick the champion you like more and will play more, or just get both of them when you save enough :)

I have {{champion:267}} and a skin for her. I love her a lot but she actually is a tough champion, between landed your aiming right and not taking ks. However if you want a mid lane champ then {{champion:61}} is a great. My vote is on {{champion:267}}.

Orianna is a fantastic champion. She's got decent AP ratios and cooldowns and overall high damage output and burst. She can do a decent job supporting. She's one of the few support champs that can counter tons of mid laners and not suffer at all. In the current meta she's completely solid. I'd choose her.
Ori can do both. I'm fond of Ori overall.

orianna is tough, nami is pretty easy. orianna got hit pretty hard by the mana regen changes. possibly harder than any other mage, but she's still viable if you're good with her.  nami is just really good.

ori always stays relevant no matter what season, but shes not the easiest to play for many lower elo people. Nami is a decent support, its up to you if she fits your play style, i don't like playing her cause shes to squishy to me
If you enjoy mid more than Orianna, if you like support better than Nami.   :D
